typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as date,
		OnlineMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> onpremisescombinedmovies
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string,
		SourceSystemId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> onpremisescombinedmovieactors
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string,
		name as string,
		SourceSystemId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> onlinemovies
onpremisescombinedmovies, onpremisescombinedmovieactors join(onpremisescombinedmovies@OnlineMovieID == onpremisescombinedmovieactors@OnlineMovieID,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemMovieId = onpremisescombinedmovieactors@MovieID,
		Title = MovieTitle,
		Genre = Category,
		Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = RunTimeMin,
		TheatricalReleaseDate = ReleaseDate,
		ActorId = ActorID,
		SouthridgeMovieId = onpremisescombinedmovieactors@OnlineMovieID,
		ActorName,
		ActorGender = Gender,
		SourceSystemId = onpremisescombinedmovieactors@SourceSystemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, onlinemovies join(Select1@SourceSystemId == onlinemovies@SourceSystemId,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finalCatalog
